document_data.name: Monday Market Ground
document_data.mainbody: The '''Monday market ground''' was an open-aired marketplace located in [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The market was located along the [[Golden Way]] just inside of Almorel's eastern gate next to the [[Convent of Mitras]].
